generatedTitle: Compatible Consoles for Red Dead Redemption 2

extractFactDictList.question: What consoles is Red Dead Redemption 2 compatible with?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Red Dead Redemption 2 is compatible with the following consoles: PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5) via backward compatibility, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S via backward compatibility, PC.
extractFactDictList.phrase: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PC

extractFactDictList.question: Does Red Dead Redemption 2 support cross-play?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Please note that the game does not support any kind of cross-play.

extractFactDictList.question: Can players on different consoles play together?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Only PC players can play with PC players, only PlayStation players can play with PlayStation players, and only Xbox players can play with Xbox players.
extractFactDictList.phrase: No, players on different consoles cannot play together.

extractFactDictList.question: Can players continue their progress if they switch to a different console within the same brand?
extractFactDictList.sentence: However, you are able to continue progress if you play on PS4 and later install it on your PS5, or start on Xbox One and pick it up on Xbox Series.
